name: Empower Spell
description: You can increase the power of your spells, causing them to deal more damage.
benefit: All variable, numeric effects of an empowered spell are increased by half including bonuses to those dice rolls.
description_zh: 你可以增强法术的力量，使其造成更大的伤害。
benefit_zh: 搭配此专长时，法术效果中的所有可变量值皆增加一半。但本专长不影响豁免检定与对抗检定，对没有变量的法术也无影响。强效的法术须占用高于原本2个环位的法术位。
